meanings.definition: The act or process of moving downward.
meanings.sent1: The descents of the roller coaster were thrilling for the riders.
meanings.sent2: She carefully navigated the steep descents of the hiking trail.
meanings.sent3: The descents of the elevator were so smooth, it felt like floating.
meanings.sent4: His grades took a sudden descent after he stopped studying.
meanings.sent5: The descent of the sun below the horizon marked the end of the day.

meanings.sent1: The descents on the ski slope were perfect for beginners.
meanings.sent2: The road had many descents, making it a challenging bike route.
meanings.sent3: The descents of the water slide were so fast, it felt like flying.
meanings.sent4: The descent of the hill was so steep, it took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The descent of the river into the valley created a beautiful landscape.

meanings.definition: A moral, social, or intellectual decline.
meanings.sent1: The descents of his behavior were concerning to his friends.
meanings.sent2: She observed a gradual descent in the quality of the company's products.
meanings.sent3: The descent of his manners was so drastic, it became a topic of gossip.
meanings.sent4: The descent of the town into chaos was unexpected by its residents.
meanings.sent5: The descent of his reputation in the community was hard to ignore.
